ygData.subject: RE: RE: Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids (and  some P.S.'s for Sylly)
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i asked this before but everyone may have missed it.  i believe Nag s fear spell is called Dragon Roar, correct?  well that s the one i see that looks like
ygData.messageBody:
ok i asked this before but everyone may have missed it. i believe Nag's
fear spell is called Dragon Roar, correct? well that's the one i see that
looks like fear and it says i resist the Dragon Roar spell. now, i can't
even remember the last time i was feared, but what happens now is sometimes
i get the resist message as expected, and other times i get the message that
i lose control of myself and i have the fear icon, but there is no effect
(i.e. i am undoubtedly not feared). what's up with that?

Shada

> Also, my experience with resists: I am playing elemental and
> guardian with drum. A
> fear gets through (lucky roll for Naggy?) and my songs drop
> while I am feared.
